title: Coconut orange muffins
ingredients: ['1 (300g) tin mandarin oranges, drained (reserving 120ml of the juice)', '200g sugar', '150ml vegetable oil', '2 eggs', '2 teaspoons Lorann Orange Bakery Emulsion (or orange extract)', '375g plain flour', '1 tablespoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '150g vanilla or white chocolate chips', 'Topping', '100g desiccated coconut', '5 tablespoons sugar', '2 tablespoons butter, melted']
